content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Mary Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Hello Mary Smith, it's a pleasure to meet you. I understand that you are interested in renting my apartment in New York. As the landlord, my goal is to maximize my gains, so I would like to discuss the rental price with you. Could you please provide me with your budget for the rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am currently studying abroad in New York and I am looking for a small, affordable apartment to live in for the next year. My budget is around 700-800 Euros per month. Could you please give me your proposal?
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Thank you for sharing your budget, Mary Smith. Based on your budget, I would like to propose a rental price of 750 Euros per month. This price is reasonable and reflects the current market conditions in New York. I believe that this price is within your budget and also offers me a fair return on my investment. Would you be interested in renting the apartment at this price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 750 Euros per month. However, I would like to know if there are any additional costs that I should be aware of before signing the lease agreement, such as move-in fees or security deposits?
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Thank you for your acceptance, Mary Smith. In addition to the monthly rental price of 750 Euros, there will be a one-time move-in fee of 50 Euros, which covers the cost of cleaning and preparing the apartment for your move-in. There will also be a security deposit of 300 Euros, which will be refundable at the end of the lease term, provided that the apartment is left in good condition. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns about these additional costs.
name: Heinrich Heine
